Name: 烛光迷局 Candlelight
About the game: This is a Lovecraftian horror, Point and Click adventure game. (The total process is about 20 minutes, including two endings.) - Game Features - ·Black and white hand-drawing, 70s style art. ·You have a Keeper with you. ·Find different clues by using your 'Awake'. - Reminder - ·This is not a game that full of vicious jumpscares, anyone can play it. ·Shout out to Octavi Navarro! I may can't get this far until your work inspired me! I'm going all out for the next and final episode. This is the first game made by Lawsquare133. Thank you for your support.
